b.specifica_img_url,b.inv_price,b.inv_num,b.inv_sale_num,b.inv_code,b.specifica_img_id,c.image_url,d.product_detail,d.product_message FROM t_mall_product a LEFT JOIN (SELECT e.product_id,e.inv_price,e.inv_num,e.inv_sale_num,e.specifica_img_id,f.specifica_img_url,e.inv_code FROM t_mall_product_inventory e LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica f ON e.specifica_img_id=f.id WHERE e.is_default=1 AND e.is_delete=0)b ON a.id=b.product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT image_url,ass_id FROM t_mall_image_associative WHERE is_main_images=1 AND is_delete=0 AND ass_type=1)c ON a.id=c.ass_id left join t_mall_product_detail d on d.product_id=a.id WHERE a.id= #{id}
